ClassDecl.Name: GuiSelectableListControl
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Represents a list control that each item is selectable.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetStyleSelected
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Change the visual affect of an item style controller to be selected or unselected.</summary> <param name="style">The item style controller.</param> <param name="value">Set to true if the item is expected to be rendered as selected.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GuiSelectableListControl
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a control with a specified style provider.</summary> <param name="_styleProvider">The style provider.</param> <param name="_itemProvider">The item provider as a data source.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMultiSelect
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the multiple selection mode.</summary> <returns>Returns true if multiple selection is enabled.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetMultiSelect
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the multiple selection mode.</summary> <param name="value">Set to true to enable multiple selection.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSelectedItems
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get indices of all selected items.</summary> <returns>Indices of all selected items.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSelectedItemIndex
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the index of the selected item.</summary> <returns>Returns the index of the selected item. If there are multiple selected items, or there is no selected item, -1 will be returned.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSelectedItemText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the text of the selected item.</summary> <returns>Returns the text of the selected item. If there are multiple selected items, or there is no selected item, or <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiListControl::IItemPrimaryTextView@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiListControl" /></links> is not a valid view for the item provider, an empty string will be returned.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSelected
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the selection status of an item.</summary> <returns>The selection status of an item.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetSelected
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the selection status of an item.</summary> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> <param name="value">Set to true to select the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SelectItemsByClick
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the selection status of an item, and affect other selected item according to key status.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> <param name="ctrl">Set to true if the control key is pressing.</param> <param name="shift">Set to true if the shift key is pressing.</param> <param name="leftButton">Set to true if clicked by left mouse button, otherwise right mouse button.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SelectItemsByKey
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the selection status using keys.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="code">The key code that is pressing.</param> <param name="ctrl">Set to true if the control key is pressing.</param> <param name="shift">Set to true if the shift key is pressing.</param> </Document>
